data.actual_result: You do not appear immediately, you need to scroll up first
data.short_description: If you are placed at the very top of the member list, switching Invisible and switching back online won't make you reappear in the list unless you scroll up
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in the topmost position of the online member list in a server - switch invisible and wait a few seconds - switch back online/idle/dnd - open member list again
